transcript: as time has gone on I continue to expand the block of time that is free in my calendar so that I have time to think Charlie said and different occasions that he and Warren spend 6 hours plus per day just reading and thinking and they're obviously in a position where they have so much leverage where they need to make one to two really good decisions a year and that's a good year obviously I'm not at that level but there is a degree of Leverage that I try to emulate where if I can make better decisions I can get so much more for the effort that I put in by allocating my time into the right vehicles
